sys_template.name: Branch - Reality Port Unresponsive
sys_template.short_description: Reality Port Unresponsive to the LOGOFF and TANDEM Commands
sys_template.template:
short_description=Reality Port Unresponsive to the LOGOFF and TANDEM Commands^instructions=**This interaction template should be used ONLY when a port in Reality (Branch System) does not respond to either the LOGOFF or TANDEM commands in TCL**
Datebase e.g. Wolcen2, Mars, Juno etc : Port ID e.g. 1234 : Status of Port e.g. WRITE ITEM, LOCK ITEM, READ ITEM etc : Routine/Program in use. In TCL, CT GM.TERM XXXX (where XXXX is the port number) : Last action user took when session hung/froze :^affected_system=^cmdb_ci=^close_notes=^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=^subcategory=^close_code=
